mapper.select: SELECT ${tableName}.NO, ${tableName}.WRITER, ${tableName}.TITLE, ${tableName}.CONTENT, nf.nfile, nf.ofile, DATE(${tableName}.REGDATE) AS REGDATE, ${tableName}.VISITCOUNT FROM ${tableName} LEFT OUTER JOIN ${tableName}_FILE NF ON ${tableName}.NO = NF.fileNO ORDER BY ${tableName}.NO DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
